title: Hextech Crafting - Snowdown Sweets Not Available on OCE?

embed.description: Snowdown is on its way, and it's bringing a mountain of sweets, treats, and cheer! With new seasonal deals every day from December 14, 2016 19:01 AEDT through January 10, 2017 18:59 AEDT you won't want to miss it.

body: I am unsure if this is intended, but I cannot purchase "Snowdown Sweets" on a Saturday. The past two weeks, if I recall correctly, Snowdown sweets have not been purchasable on Saturdays even though the event states that they can be purchased on weekends. Is this intended, if not, is it possible to be able to purchase the "Snowdown Sweets" for the weeks missed?

replies.body:
its weekends in the US.

They dont show up til about 6pm saturday and are still in the store til Monday night.
Thanks for the answer. However, this strikes me as ridiculous. we are the OCE server, so wouldn't we base the times on the largest Oceanic country? not America.
